summary: The module offers a parser that reads StarkNet contract ABI JSON files and builds structured dataclass representations of functions, events, structs, enums, and types, while handling type resolution and referenceâ€‘cycle detection. It also includes a Lark transformer that converts parsed ABI syntax trees into internal Cairo type objects, providing utilities for constructing arrays, booleans, identifiers, numeric and composite types.
business_intent: Facilitate reliable ingestion and interpretation of StarkNet contract ABIs so that developers can validate, generate code for, and interact with contracts programmatically.
